description: Defines the OCRService class which abstracts OCR functionalities, providing a method to extract text and metadata from files.

classes.name: OCRService
classes.description: An abstraction layer for OCR processing, capable of integrating with OCR engines like Tesseract, AWS Textract, or GCV. Currently returns stub data.

methods.name: Tuple[str,dict] extract_text(self, abs_path: str, mime_type: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Extracts text from a specified file path, returning the recognized text and JSON metadata. Includes optional MIME type hint.

ctags.name: extract_text
ctags.pattern: /^    def extract_text(self, abs_path: str, mime_type: Optional[str] = None) -> Tuple[str, dict]:$/
